Author: Meyse#0952
Content: and what is the logic for the dice game? choose 1-6 and then win or lose (odds5) ? add 1 more dice? (odds11)?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Hmm, we may start from super easy game: 6 sides dice, player have to guess number  (odds 5)

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: And super gambler option guess two from two (odds 35)

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: And then proceed to cards

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: how do you mean 2 from 2?

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: like how would that work in practice

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Should be two separate `dicebet` on odds 6

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Hmm but it's a good question

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: No, just one bet with odds 35

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: And then GUI magic

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
I mean player have to guess number on dice1 and on dice2 and he win only if guessed right both numbers
1/6 * 1/6 = 1/36
So we can just place single dicebet with odds35

Author: Meyse#0952
Content: right yes got it
